subject: From The Desk of Nan Cheng
body:
From The Desk of Nan Cheng
Singapore Refining Company Pte Ltd (SRC).
Greetings, I Hope this message finds you well.
Your reputable profile inspired me to contact you for a possible  crude-oil business venture for which the commission is expected to raise up to 1mUSD  monthly.
This is to Seek your interest,  before sharing the full details with you.
Regards
Nan Cheng
Procurement officer

subject: Re:   From The Desk of Nan Cheng
body:
Hello Nan Cheng,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well too. I'm always open to exploring new business opportunities, so I would be interested in hearing more about this venture you mentioned.

Could you please provide me with some additional information about the nature of the business and how exactly the commission is expected to be raised on a monthly basis? It would help me better understand the potential benefits and risks involved.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Donny

subject: Re: From The Desk of Nan Cheng
body:
Greetings,
             I work as a procurement officer for the Singapore Refining
Company Pte Ltd (SRC).

We have recently signed a CRUDE Oil purchase agreement from the NATIONAL
OIL CORPORATION OF LIBYA (NOCL) and urgently need crude oil license agents
from the NOCL.

This is because the NOCL does not sell their CRUDE directly to the buyers
rather, through their approved licensed agents who act as their sales
agent/middleman between them and their buyers.

 Being a license holder guarantees you a monthly commission of not less
than 1 to 3 million dollars monthly if my company utilizes your license for
this monthly crude purchase. I am approaching you to quickly apply to
become a crude oil license holder with the NOCL, I have contacts within the
NOCL who will facilitate your application and make sure it is approved.

Provided you application is approved, and you are licensed, I will make
sure my company SRC utilizes your approved license for their monthly
purchase, and you will receive monthly commission which could be as high 1
to 3 million US dollars,

If you decide to take up this proposition, we can further discuss how we
share the commission between ourselves. I will further guide you on how to
apply for the license from the NOCL.
Regards
Nan Cheng

subject: Re: From The Desk of Nan Cheng
body:
Hello Nan Cheng,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I'm interested in learning more about becoming a crude oil license holder with the NOCL. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What are the specific responsibilities and duties of a crude oil license holder?
2. How long does the application process usually take, and what are the requirements?
3. Are there any costs or fees associated with obtaining the license?
4. Can you explain how the commission sharing works between your company and the license holders?
5. Is there any legal documentation or contract involved in this agreement?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Donny
